Package nl.bioinf.wvanhelvoirt.HadoopPhredCalculator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AveragePhredCalculator
    AveragePhredCalculator This class can be used to calculate the average phred score values per base per read in a Fastq file.
    CombineReducer
    CombineReducer The Reducer class that combines the data from all the mappers to a single array.
    FastqFileOutputFormat
    FastqFileOutputFormat This is a custom OutputFormat class for fastqc files.
    FastqFileRecordWriter
    FastqFileRecordWriter This is a custom class to write the output of the Reducer to a fastqc file.
    FastqPathFilter
    FastqPathFilter This class checks if paths are fastq/fq files for use with Hadoop MapReduce.
    NReadInputFormat
    NReadInputFormat This is a custom InputFormat class for Multiple readlines per mapper.
    NReadRecordReader
    NReadRecordReader This is a custom class to create a RecordReader for each split.
    ParallelPhredCalculator
    ParallelPhredCalculator
    ReadMapper
    ReadMapper The Mapper class will receive one RecordReader containing reads (one read is 4 lines), and process it.
    TextArrayWritable
    TextArrayWritable A Custom Writable class based on the ArrayWritable, but uses Text's instead of Writable's.
